original_text: And it was so, that when he had turned his back to go from Samuel, God gave him another heart: and all those signs came to pass that day.
korean_text: 그가 사무엘에게서 떠나려고 몸을 돌이킬 때에 하나님이 새 마음을 주셨고 그 날 그 징조도 다 응하니라

sentences.original_text: that when he had turned his back to go from Samuel
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사무엘에게서 돌아서서 떠나려고 할 때

sentences.original_text: and all those signs came to pass
